longDescription: Attractive three-bedroom semi-detached family home within walking distance of shops, schools and transport links. Two reception rooms, kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. Utility room and cloakroom. Double glazing and gas central heating.
location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

shortDescription: Modern 2 bed garden flat with courtyard
longDescription: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout, this two double-bedroom, two-bathroom garden flat features an open-plan kitchen/living area with integrated appliances and bi-fold doors to a private courtyard garden. Under building guarantee.

shortDescription: 4 bed detached house with driveway & garden
longDescription: Spacious four-bedroom detached home with large rear garden, driveway parking and a bright open-plan kitchen/diner. Ideal for families looking for extra space and easy commuter access.

shortDescription: 1 bed apartment close to rail & shops
longDescription: A well-presented one-bedroom apartment with modern kitchen and contemporary bathroom, located close to amenities and transport. Suitable for first-time buyers or investors.
Recently renovated two-bedroom terraced house with a modern kitchen, updated bathroom and landscaped garden. Great for commuters with quick access to nearby stations.
Three-bedroom top-floor flat with balcony, bright living room and ample storage. Includes allocated parking and is a short walk to cafes, parks and public transport.

shortDescription: 5 bed executive home with home office
longDescription: Executive five-bedroom home with a dedicated home office, large open-plan family area, and landscaped garden. Excellent for larger families and hybrid working.
